Articles.Content:
Been Playing around with the toroidal fuel tanks, dang things are near indestructible.

https://www.dropbox.com/s/zhzp6mer9y53m3x/ZOOMerang%21.craft

I had to add rockets for it just to spin, the wings don't generate lift so it doesn't fly but only in a straight line lol. Kerbal-kind still insisted the universe needed one of this.

I challenge the people of this forum to build an orbit-capable rocket using toroidal tanks as the only fuel tank. (No RCS, Xenon, or LiquidFuel tanks)

Bonus points for SSTO?
